purpose: To provide developers with a curated list of tools, frameworks, and resources for creating AI-powered web agents
principle: Aggregates and categorizes various open-source tools and frameworks for easy access and exploration
reusability: Serves as a reference guide for developers looking to explore or integrate AI web agent technologies
limitations: As a resource list, it does not provide direct functionalities but rather points to external tools and frameworks
